post.body: Lol, tres cutee!
Yay for Amazon Prime?!
doesn't believe that anybody feels the way I do about you now..
needs to get out of here asap..
really hates her fucking life.
loves iChat and gchat :)
is hoping that the stupid snow stops interfering with her life -_-
is STILL at work, whilst everyone else is at home, being fattycakes in their PJs :(
is kind of hoping that work is canceled for tomorrow. Sigh ;(
hates when people tell her how to act in social settings. I'm socially awkward, damnit, and I can't lie to someone's face.
is happy that it's TGIW .. kind of :P
apparently makes up her own vacation days.
is fucking annoyed.
is reading at Panera.. http://twitpic.com/t802
needs to think of an idea for her Secret Santa(s)!
loves having one-on-one convos with people :)
is feeling socially awkward and out of place..
has been nursing a ginger ale, hard cider, and Captain&ginger ale. I need to pee again! http://twitpic.com/sde9
is hanging out in Jersey City with coworkers. They like to drink :x
is having major food coma, and is contemplating napping instead of hanging out tonight :x
